messages.message:
I think there are some issue with `make run-docker`  in `post-install-action-base-model-upload`  on master

```Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/instabase-mktplace-update/py/publish_solutions.py", line 15, in <module>
    from instabase.solution_utils import solution, post_install_setup_util
  File "/instabase-mktplace-update/py/instabase/solution_utils/solution.py", line 20, in <module>

    from instabase.metrics_utils import aihub_metrics_util

ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'flask'
Sending termination signal to Envoy.
No Envoy processes were found to terminate.
Main application failed with status 1.
make: *** [Makefile:51: run-docker] Error 1```
Edit: same for `model-service`
I think this should fix it: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/72791

```docker run  --name instabase-model-service --user root --env-file /home/owner/instabase/data-services/model-services/model-service/tmp/docker_env_local.list \
--rm -v /private/tmp/models:/tmp/models -p 7800:7800 -i instabase/model-service
Parent process id 7
